name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-personal-greeting
title: Personal Greeting Web Part
shortDescription: The web part pulls in the current user's name and displays it on the page. The greeting text before the name is customizable through the property pane. Additionally the position of the greeting and color of the text can be adjusted through the property pane as well.
longDescription: The web part pulls in the current user's name and displays it on the page. The greeting text before the name is customizable through the property pane. Additionally the position of the greeting and color of the text can be adjusted through the property pane as well.

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
